meanings.sent1: The librarian reclassifies the books by genre every month.
meanings.sent2: She reclassifies the documents based on their importance.
meanings.sent3: The teacher reclassifies the students' seating arrangement for fun.
meanings.sent4: The scientist reclassifies the planets in our solar system after new discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The chef reclassifies the ingredients to create a new recipe.

meanings.definition: To assign to a different category or group
meanings.sent1: The museum curator reclassifies the artifacts based on their historical significance.
meanings.sent2: He reclassifies the products according to their popularity among customers.
meanings.sent3: The zookeeper reclassifies the animals for a special exhibit.
meanings.sent4: The manager reclassifies the tasks to improve efficiency in the team.
meanings.sent5: The designer reclassifies the colors to match the new theme.
